analysis.key_quote: Schedule F will remove experienced, objective, and committed civil servants, who deserve our respect because they serve the American people, and replace them with political appointees who lack expertise and are chosen only because they support President Trump.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes Schedule F, highlighting concerns about politicization, the loss of experienced civil servants, and the undermining of scientific integrity, which aligns with the themes of merit-based systems and due process.
